definition: common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party

sentences.english: China stands ready to earnestly implement the agreement together with Vietnam.
sentences.chinese: 中方願與越方共同努力，認真落實協議。

sentences.english: The Chinese side would like to work together with Arab states to compose a new chapter of China-Arab friendly cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 中方願與阿方共同努力，譜寫中阿友好合作的新篇章。

sentences.english: A peaceful future is possible only with two states, not just the one.
sentences.chinese: 但是孤掌難鳴，只有巴以雙方共同努力才能實現和平。

sentences.english: We look forward to growing our business together with DHL.
sentences.chinese: 我們很期待與敦豪一起爲我們的業務開發共同努力。

sentences.english: We are willing to cooperate with both new and old customers to create a beautiful tomorrow in common!
sentences.chinese: 願與新老客戶精誠合作，爲開創碧水藍天共同努力。

sentences.english: The ROK will work with China to cope with the international financial crisis, he said.
sentences.chinese: 韓方將同中方共同努力，應對國際金融危機。

sentences.english: Public support is urged to help control rat infestations in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 防治蟲鼠人員呼籲市民共同努力控制鼠患。

sentences.english: China is willing to join hands with Slovenia to deepen cooperation in various fields, said Wen.
sentences.chinese: 我們願與斯方共同努力，不斷深化各領域的合作。

sentences.english: Tape the backboard pattern together to make the full pattern.
sentences.chinese: 磁帶的籃板模式共同努力，使全模式。

sentences.english: Finally, in the motherland and the people work together in harmony through the joint efforts of the difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 最後，在祖國人民上下一心，共同努力下度過了難關。

sentences.english: The Chinese side would like to work with the Malaysian side to advance such relationship.
sentences.chinese: 中方願與馬方共同努力，將中馬關係不斷推向前進。

sentences.english: I look forward to working with you to take the China-UK relationship to a new high.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們共同努力，推動中英關係更上一層樓。

sentences.english: This illustrates the large and joint effort still required for mitigating climate change.
sentences.chinese: 這說明了大和共同努力，仍需要爲減緩氣候變化。

sentences.english: When they have offspring, the couple works together to care for them.
sentences.chinese: 當有了後代，一對田鼠會共同努力照料它們的後代。

sentences.english: Let us all work together for the ultimate realization of a nuclear weapon-free world.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們爲最終實現無核武器的世界而共同努力。

sentences.english: We must work together to promote and utilise each other's strengths, " he said.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須共同努力促進和利用彼此的優勢，”他說道。

definition: to join forces/to give full cooperation
to coordinate closely/to act in close partnership with
to twist together to form a rope/(fig.) to unite/to work together
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to walk hand in hand/to cooperate
to tackle a thorny problem and overcome its challenges
when everybody gathers fuel, the flames are higher (idiom)/the more people, the more strength
pinyin: zhong4 ren2 shi2 chai2 huo3 yan4 gao1

definition: to call on (sb to do sth)/to appeal (to)/an appeal
